channel.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
channel.description:
So ... What's on your wish list ... as GM &/or Player? For my part I'm hoping to work my through my settings wishlist: Achtung! Cthulhu Dark; Night's Black Agents; Scion; Dresden Files; Soliman Kane; and 7th Sea.
My system wishlist ... Band of Blades &/or Blades in the Dark; Tides of Gold &/or Rapscallion; Urban Shadows; Sprawl &/or Veil.
What are you interested in?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @jco
item.description:
@jco wrote:

I’ve taken the plunge on ars magica which I didn’t think I’d be willing to do but it’s a bucket list thing for me

Trying to get an urban shadows PBP off the ground to mixed success

Still very curious what the finalized hearts of wulin rules are going to look like, esp for longer campaigns

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

On the system front: I’ve managed to get into Lowell’s Veil: Fantasy series and, though Blades in the Dark has passed me by this Autumn, I’m claiming a series of Hack the Planet (which is FitD) in its place. Annoyingly I didn’t spot @LeandroP’s The Sprawl session in Gauntlet Con before booking other games, so it remains my white whale for the Spring.

I have managed to squeeze some Demigods into the Gauntlet Calendar in December so that I can tentatively mark Scion off my Autumn setting list - hope it goes well as it’s someting I’d like to play more of. No room, though, for Dresden Files, Soloman Kane or 7th Sea (though my Rapscallion 2-shot might just count … a bit … for the latter?).

Listening to @Alexi_Sarge’s 1950 Vienna Urban Shadows session (http://gauntlet.hellomouth.net/?name=20190930__Urban_Shadows_-_Vienna_1950_Session_1_4__Cloven_Pine_Games.mp3) has reminded me of Cold City (https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/20677/Cold-City-v11) which has sat on my hard drive for a decade, if not more.

I’m thinking it might be possible to drift my Achtung! Cthulhu Dark hack (itself a drift of Cthulhu Dark by Graham Walmsley) to play a game about '… hunting monsters and eldritch creatures in Berlin during the early part of the Cold War, a time when the city is slowly rebuilding itself …’ and ‘… the characters are drawn from the former allies who now occupy Germany …’. Perhaps this is a Xmas Break Project …

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @CptHygelac
item.description:
@CptHygelac wrote:

For me, I’d love to get Scum and Villainy or Urban Shadows to the table. Also, there’s a really interesting looking Hogwarts RPG out there and autumn always feels like Harry Potter to me

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @theziggyed
item.description:
@theziggyed wrote:

I’d like to play some Stars Without Number: Black Sun Codex or even just the base game. Such a simple, nice system that feels easy to learn but still…flexible?

Keeping up with the Kevin Crawford fan train, Godbound is a game I keep visiting over and over in my head, coming up with character concepts.

Under Hollow Hills, although still in early draft stages (kinda) seems really interesting. One of the few PbTA I’d really want to play right now.

Zweihander, 13th Age and Deep Morphean Transmissions also look really interesting.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

What price a 2/3-shot of Demigods in December @Rob_Ruthven? I’m pencilling in Sunday pm’s …

item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Rob_Ruthven
item.description:
@Rob_Ruthven wrote:

Here’s my current wishlist of games I’d like to try out:

  • Demigods
  • Flotsam
  • Hit the Streets (as a player instead of GM)
  • Impulse Drive
  • Kuro (have run once but never played)
  • Root: the TRPG (scheduled to run, but would like to play sometime too)
  • Sunset Kills
  • Trophy (heard a lot of buzz about it, but haven’t tried it yet)
  • Uncanny Echo
  • Voidheart Symphony

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @jasonlutes
item.description:
@jasonlutes wrote:

I’m running a very intermittent ongoing online game of Freebooters on the Frontier, and for my face-to-face group I’m running an all-out Masks of Nyarlathotep campaign (props and everything), but what I REALLY want to do is enlist 8-12 of my students in a new Freebooters campaign where I break them into groups of 3-4 to create different parts of the world, start everyone out as level-0 villagers, and then have them tag-team in and out as their characters grow, live and die in the world they created. Too little time in this life.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

My thanks to @Toby for prompting me to put a late arriving 2-shot of Rapscallion on the first two Sundays in Oct. Now that I’ve read the rules I’m not sure it’s going to be the perfect vehicle for 7th Sea … Seems much more Pirates of the Carib. However, I’ll know better after these 2 sessions. Either way it ticks another game off my system wishlist, so what’s not to like.
Feel free to waitlist as my player groups have been incredibly volatile this last month or so … The joy of Open Table!

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @GerwynWalters
item.description:
@GerwynWalters wrote:

Dito Hearts of Wulin but also, i’d love to have a crack at Good Society. There is so many things about that game that appeals to me.

off the gauntlet, I want to play the new Aberrant game in the Trinity continuum

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @jco
item.description:
@jco wrote:

Honestly? Hearts of Wulin, heh. I’m a huge wuxia junkie and I’m excited to hopefully get the finished rules within the next couple of months. I’m hoping to get a PBF going once they come out!

I’d love to one day get to play Chuubo’s Imaginary Wish Granting Engine but…not holding my breath!!

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Jacob_Wood
item.description:
@Jacob_Wood wrote:

I have so few opportunities nowadays, I’d be happy to play just about anything.

probably the highest on my list though is the new Princess Bride RPG. Either that or Part-Time Gods 2nd Edition.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Time for an update on my original wish-list …
Settings … Currently …
GM-ing my way through the ‘Achtung! Cthulhu’ setting using my Achtung!Cthulhu Dark drift of CD.
The 2 x 2-shots of Night’s Black Operators (using the Operator rules to run the Night’s Black Agents setting I ran in August weren’t perfect but were a sufficiently positive proof of concept for me to put a series up in October.
Scion; Dresden Files; Soliman Kane; and 7th Sea … Still in the wish-list …

My system wishlist …
Band of Blades &/or Blades in the Dark - played in my first BoB session this week and goodness there’s a lot to keep track of in that system!
Tides of Gold - I ran this at a Con in August and it seemed a much more forgiving FitD than BoB, for instance. I’m wondering whether it (or Rapscallion … also on my system list) might bring 7th Sea to the table in Dec. … so technically missing Ng my Autumn window.
Urban Shadows; Sprawl &/or Veil - still on the list to scratch my Cyberpunk itch.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?

item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

Don’t know where you are based but day time in the US is often ideal for an evening game in a GMT-adjacent zone. @Tylom and @JimLikesGames, are often to be found in GMT-ish sessions.

item.dc:creator: @diyanddragons
item.description:
@diyanddragons wrote:

Since I started working the night-shift, my chances to play anything have been very limited.

Current aspirational goals, though:

  • play Shadows of Brimstone (technically a board game, but a good dungeoncrawl)
  • play in a GLOG game (maybe in the works?)
  • get my head together enough regarding system to run some-thing for my friends

item.title: What do you most want to play this Autumn and why?
item.dc:creator: @WestyWilner
item.description:
@WestyWilner wrote:

I grabbed myself a copy of Spire and hope to run it as at least a one-shot this year.

I also plan to run Death Frost Doom using WoDu as a Halloween game this year.

Other than that, I’m mostly looking forward to my 5e game starting up again, and hopefully I’ll get to continue the Apocalypse World game I ran as a one-shot in the spring.

Read full topic
